query:
ALTER TABLE capital_budget_cycles 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS duration INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 4 AFTER endYear,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inflationRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 2.00 AFTER totalBudget,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS escalationRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00 AFTER inflationRate,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS fundingConstraints TEXT AFTER escalationRate,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS archivedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER updatedAt,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS archivedBy INT NULL AFTER archivedAt;

ALTER TABLE capital_budget_cycles 
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('planning','approved','active','completed','archived') DEFAULT 'planning' NOT NULL;
